amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of H. R. 2485, considered as having been adopted in the Committee and the House pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 238.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute pursuant to H. Res. 238.
Rules amendment (A001) modified pursuant to H. Res. 238, modified by the amendment printed in House Rept. 104-282, accompanying H. Res. 238.
On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) as modified considered adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 238.
